thread.title: Julian Edelman Reveals What He Told Tom Brady After Amazing Super Bowl Catch [Video]
thread.title_full: Julian Edelman Reveals What He Told Tom Brady After Amazing Super Bowl Catch [Video]

title: Julian Edelman Reveals What He Told Tom Brady After Amazing Super Bowl Catch [Video]
text: Superfan TV • February 7, 2017 With just a couple minutes left in the Super Bowl and the New England Patriots down by eight points, Julian Edelman made an incredible catch that will go down in history as one of the best of all time. The Patriots, of course, continued down the field and tied up the game, eventually winning it in the first overtime in Super Bowl history. On Monday night, Julian and his head coach, Bill Belichick, stopped by The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon as part of their victory tour, and Julian told everyone what he said to Tom Brady after the miraculous play. Julian said, “I looked at him and I said, ‘Hey, we gotta peter, peter, peter’ … which means, ‘Let’s get to the ball and snap it so they can’t review it.'” While there is no debating his talent, Julian did admit that “It was probably, like, 70 percent luck.” The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon airs weeknights at 11:35 p.m. on NBC. Watch: Colbert’s Post Super Bowl Interview With Trump Tell us what you think! Hit us up on Twitter , Facebook , or Instagram — or leave your comments below. And check out our host, Cynthia LuCiette, on Twitter , Facebook , or Instagram .
